headline: Developer Spotlight: Automating Workflows with Airtable and Cloudflare Workers
keywords: Full Stack Week, Cloudflare Workers, Developer Spotlight
description: Jacob operates TriTails Premium Beef, an online store for meat, a very perishable good. So he has a unique set of challenges with shipping. As a developer, he turned to Airtable and Cloudflare Workers to automate large parts of the process to be able to deal with their rapid growth.
